1.1.name: wordpress/wp-auto-refresh
1.1.description: This plugin is great for people who have a very busy site and want a refresh every 10, 20, 30, 60, 1800 seconds or whatever you specify in the file. It has a built in filter for enabling this code on specific posts & pages.
